name: yard
description: Simulate running around on a yard with many people.

scripts.postinstall: multiview [ npm run install-client ] [ npm run install-server ] -x 4000
scripts.dev: multiview [ npm run dev-client ] [ npm run dev-server ] -x 1000
scripts.dev-client: cd yard-client && npm run serve && cd ..
scripts.dev-server: cd yard-server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.build-client: cd yard-client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=production cd yard-server && npm start && cd ..

author: Stefan Neubert <dev@steditor.net>
